sentences.sContent: ...the Chernobyl disaster, which irradiated large parts of Europe.
sentences.sCn: ...辐射了欧洲大部的切尔诺贝利灾难。

remMethod.val: ir(使) + radiate(发热， 生光) → 使发光 → 使明亮

trans.tranCn: 照耀；使灿烂；启发；放射；使某物生辉
trans.tranOther: if someone or something is irradiated,  x-rays  or  radioactive  beams are passed through them
